NK072(nu)006:5984: khyad par gsum pos rang sa'i 'bras bu la drangs
NK072(nu)006:5985: ma h+aas yi ge 'khor lo'i sar drangs ba dang
NK072(nu)006:5986: don byed rgya che chung gis khyad par gsum gyi
NK072(nu)006:5987: rang sa'i 'og ma la ma h+aas ris med kyi
NK072(nu)006:5988: sku'o // gdul bya la / de ltar khyad par
NK072(nu)006:5989: bzhi las dpags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'bras bu'i
NK072(nu)006:5991: de nas dgongs pa'i bzhugs tshul ni b+ho d+hi la sogs sa bzhi'i rgyal ba dag /
NK072(nu)006:5992: dbu mas rgyud gcig tu 'dod pa 'dres par stong
NK072(nu)006:5993: pa nyid du thim nas 'gro bar 'dod pa dang
NK072(nu)006:5994: sems tsam du kri yog pa ni ngo bo gcig
NK072(nu)006:5995: kyang sbyangs pa'i ye shes ma 'dres te tha dad
NK072(nu)006:5996: las grol bar 'dod de sbyangs pa'i ma 'dres par
NK072(nu)006:5998: 'dir ma h+aa la ltos na drangs don phyogs re
NK072(nu)006:5999: tsam yin te khyad par gong du bshad pa bzhin
NK072(nu)006:6000: yin pa'i phyir ro dgongs rgyud kyi bzhugs tshul ma
NK072(nu)006:6001: h+aa yo ga rgyud tha dad las grol zhing ma
NK072(nu)006:6003: des na dgongs pa'i khyad par bsam las 'das te
NK072(nu)006:6004: gong gi rnam grangs dang ngo bo dang byin rlabs
NK072(nu)006:6005: dang don byed rgya che chung la sogs pa'i khyad
NK072(nu)006:6006: par bzhin no // ming grangs kyi khyad par ni
NK072(nu)006:6007: nyan rang la sogs pa la ltos na theg chen
NK072(nu)006:6008: dang sngags la ltos na lta spyod dman pa byang
NK072(nu)006:6009: chub sems dpa'i theg pa bas //
NK072(nu)006:6010: lam thun mong tshogs gnyis kyis 'bras bu bcu gcig
NK072(nu)006:6011: kun tu 'od kyi sa ru bde bar gshegs shing
NK072(nu)006:6012: // chos nyid kyi stobs kyis de bzhin nyid du stong zhing bdag med mngon du gshegs pa yang //
NK072(nu)006:6013: dus grangs med gsum kyi dbang btsan pa'i phyir snga ma rang don bzhin du rjes 'jug kyang /
NK072(nu)006:6014: bde bar gshegs pa de bzhin nyid dang gsang sngags phyi rgyud ba la'ang //
NK072(nu)006:6015: kri ya pa bya ba'i dang u pa ya'i lugs
NK072(nu)006:6016: kyi shes rab kyi lta ba dang ye shes gnyis
NK072(nu)006:6017: su med par rtogs pa ni /
NK072(nu)006:6018: cho ga'i yan lag kun rdzogs pa'i rnam par grangs bcu gcig rdzogs par byas pas //
NK072(nu)006:6019: 'bras bu rigs gsum dkyil 'khor lam du byas pas dgongs pa bde bar gshegs pa'am //
NK072(nu)006:6020: 'bras bu kri ya rdo rje 'dzin gyi par gnas lugs de bzhin nyid ltar mngon du gshegs pa'o //
NK072(nu)006:6021: yang na grol lam ma ltos na thabs lam spyi'i gnas bya rgod phung po'i ri 'dab log tu //
NK072(nu)006:6022: dgon pa'i phug pa bye ma 'dab sna ru //
NK072(nu)006:6023: b+ha ga wan gyi zhal mthong 'khor dge slong sa
NK072(nu)006:6024: ri zhes bya ba la slob dpon dgra bcom pa
NK072(nu)006:6025: lnga brgya'i rgyal tshab tu dbyung ba'i phyir tshig dang
NK072(nu)006:6026: yi ges dbang bskur bas dgra bcom thob pa ci
NK072(nu)006:6027: bzhin du nam // kri ya ba'i gnas ba ra
NK072(nu)006:6028: na si'i sme khrod mi gtsang ba med pa'i bsil
NK072(nu)006:6029: bzhin du nam // khang du // dam pa'i rigs
NK072(nu)006:6030: can khyim bdag sid+hu pra ta pa dang bram ze'i
NK072(nu)006:6031: khyim bdag ku ku ra tsa gsum la phyag rdor
NK072(nu)006:6032: gyis rigs gsum gyi dbang rdzas rdo rje rgya gram
NK072(nu)006:6033: bzhin du nam // khang du // gyis / dbang bskur nas //
NK072(nu)006:6034: rdo rje 'bras bu rigs gsum 'dzin gyi sa thob
NK072(nu)006:6035: pa'i tshul te bde bar gshegs te ji bzhin du
NK072(nu)006:6037: sngon byung rgyal ba thub pa'i dbang po yang gang gi gshegs tshul de ji bzhin du /
NK072(nu)006:6038: gshegs pa'am mtshan nyid pa dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed /
NK072(nu)006:6039: bar du bskal pa grangs med gsum la tshogs bsags /
NK072(nu)006:6040: tha ma mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du sangs
NK072(nu)006:6041: rgyas pa rgyu yi theg pa dang dang bya ba
NK072(nu)006:6043: gnyis ka'i spyod pa u pa ya'i rgyud la sogs
NK072(nu)006:6044: pa lta spyod gong 'og so so'i gzhung las grags
NK072(nu)006:6045: pa bzhin no // rnal 'byor yo ga'i gzhung gis dbang rgyal bu don grub nyid //
NK072(nu)006:6046: chu bo na dza ra'i 'gram logs su //
NK072(nu)006:6047: dka' thub mdzad pa'i dka' ba spyod pa'i tshe //
NK072(nu)006:6048: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku'i rnam pa dang
NK072(nu)006:6049: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rigs lngas chos nyid stong
NK072(nu)006:6050: pa la / gdan zla ba la /
NK072(nu)006:6053: sku phyag rgya ste mngon par byang chub pa lnga yi stobs kyis dbang bskur bas //
NK072(nu)006:6054: gnas 'og min stug po bkod pa nyid du bdag gzhan gyi don grub ste //
NK072(nu)006:6055: don grub sprul pa'i sku'i dka' thub kyi khog pa nas //
NK072(nu)006:6056: sems nyid ye shes kyi sku rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus su bde bar gshegs te /
NK072(nu)006:6057: dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab kyi ri'i rtse mor
NK072(nu)006:6058: yo ga'i chos kyi gzhung dum bu bzhi'i 'khor lo
NK072(nu)006:6059: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bskor ro
NK072(nu)006:6060: // de yang ma h+aa la ltos na rtog pa'i gzugs sku yin no //
NK072(nu)006:6061: ma h+aa rang gi man ngag thabs kyis lam dang shes rab grol ba'i lam nyid kyis //
NK072(nu)006:6062: dgongs pa la 'gro 'ong med par bder gshegs te //
NK072(nu)006:6063: chos nyid ji bzhin pa lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang du mthar son pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
NK072(nu)006:6064: de'ang dgongs pa'i bzhugs tshul dang ngo bos dang khyad par dang gsum gyi che ba'o //
NK072(nu)006:6065: rgyal bu don grub dka' thub lus can la //
NK072(nu)006:6066: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams sprin bzhin du //
NK072(nu)006:6067: 'dus pa de rnams kyi gsang ba byang chub kyi sems kyi longs spyod kyis //
NK072(nu)006:6068: srod la rtogs pa skye ba'i dus dang tho rangs ye shes skye ba'i dus nyid du //
NK072(nu)006:6069: yab yum gyi nyi zla byang sems lce thog tu bza' ba gsang ba'i dbang byin cing //
NK072(nu)006:6070: thabs kyi rol pa'i ka ra ste sbyor thabs dga' ba bcu drug bstan pa yis //
NK072(nu)006:6071: yas bab dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes mas brtan rang
NK072(nu)006:6072: gnas kyi ye shes bde ba chen po shin tu
NK072(nu)006:6073: brtan pa'i rdzogs dbang thob pa sa gzhi'i gnas lugs
NK072(nu)006:6074: de bzhin du 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa'i de
NK072(nu)006:6075: bzhin gshegs pa'o // de ltar theg pa so so'i
NK072(nu)006:6076: 'bras bu la khyad yod pa de'i phyir thun mong
NK072(nu)006:6077: gi theg pa byang chub sems dpa'i dang kri ya
NK072(nu)006:6078: yo ga'i theg pa rnam gsum las //
NK072(nu)006:6079: ma h+aa yo ga dang khyad par yod pa yin
NK072(nu)006:6080: te byang ba bzhi dang chub pa bzhi pa khyad
NK072(nu)006:6081: par yod do // de la byang chub sems dpa'
NK072(nu)006:6082: ni nyon mongs dang shes bya'i sbyangs te grol bas
NK072(nu)006:6083: par yod do // byang la / bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa thob pas chub pa'o //
NK072(nu)006:6084: kri ya ni nyon mongs pa'i zug rngu bsgyur te bral bas byang la /
NK072(nu)006:6085: rigs gsum rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa thob pas chub pa'o //
NK072(nu)006:6086: yo ga ni nyon mongs pa la sogs sbyang bsgyur
NK072(nu)006:6087: dag pas byang la rigs lnga stug po bkod pa'i
NK072(nu)006:6089: ma h+aa ni nyon mongs dang shes sgrib la sogs
NK072(nu)006:6090: pa dbang du bsdus te rang byung ye shes su
NK072(nu)006:6091: grol bas byang la sku lnga lhun gyi grub pa
NK072(nu)006:6092: ma chags pad+ma'i spyan gyis sa thob pas chub pa'o
NK072(nu)006:6093: // de bzhin du bde bar gshegs pa bzhi dang
NK072(nu)006:6094: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi ste brgyad kyis khyad par
NK072(nu)006:6095: // yod de / dang po bde bar gshegs pa bzhi ni /
NK072(nu)006:6096: byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa sbyangs te bral
NK072(nu)006:6097: nas dgongs pa bde bar gshegs thams cad kyi sar
NK072(nu)006:6098: gshegs pa dang / kri la nyon mongs pa'i zug
NK072(nu)006:6099: rngu bsgyur te bral nas dgongs pa bde bar rdor
NK072(nu)006:6100: gshegs pa dang / 'dzin gyi dang / yo ga
NK072(nu)006:6101: pa nyon mongs pa'i zug rngu bsgyur zhing bral nas
NK072(nu)006:6102: byin rlabs dgongs pa bde bar stug po bkod pa'i
NK072(nu)006:6104: ma h+aas spros pa'i zug rngu thams cad dbang du bsdus te rang grol nas /
NK072(nu)006:6105: dgongs pa bde chen gsal 'grib med par pad+ma spyan gyi sa la gshegs pa'o //
NK072(nu)006:6106: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi ni /
NK072(nu)006:6107: byang chub sems dpa' spros bral stong nyid rtogs nas de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang /
NK072(nu)006:6108: kri ya pa dbyings ye shes gnyis med dang /
NK072(nu)006:6109: kun rdzob lha'i dal du rtogs nas de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang /
NK072(nu)006:6110: yo ga pa rang sems mtha' gnyis dang /
NK072(nu)006:6111: kun rdzob snod bcud lha'i dal du rtogs nas de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang /
NK072(nu)006:6112: ma h+aa 'khor 'das gnyis su med cing bden pa
NK072(nu)006:6113: dbyer med spyod yul dang bral bar rtogs nas de
NK072(nu)006:6114: bzhin nyid du 'gro 'ong med par gshegs pa'o //
NK072(nu)006:6121: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las nyer lnga'i grangs
NK072(nu)006:6122: rdzogs ma rdzogs dang gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi
NK072(nu)006:6123: 'bras bu'i ngo bo byin rlabs dang rtsal la sogs
NK072(nu)006:6125: da dung 'dus byas ma byas pa dang 'di snang ba dang don byed /
NK072(nu)006:6126: rgya che chung la sogs pa khyad par 'dug go //
NK072(nu)006:6127: de nas rgyal ba dang bcom ldan 'das //
NK072(nu)006:6128: kyi khyad par yang 'og ma gsum thun mong mchog
NK072(nu)006:6129: ma h+aas dpags lung snga ma de bzhin gshegs pa
NK072(nu)006:6131: theg pa so so'i thabs lam dang shes rab grol ba'i lam kyis //
NK072(nu)006:6132: theg pa rang rang gi rdo rje lta bu ting nge 'dzin bzhi bskyed pas //
NK072(nu)006:6133: so so'i bdud bzhi nges par bcom nas mya ngan bzhi las /
NK072(nu)006:6134: 'das shing yod med brtag chad mtha' bzhi las 'das pa dang //
NK072(nu)006:6135: 'dod lugs mi mthun pa theg pa so so'i gzhung
NK072(nu)006:6136: gis rang rang gi sangs rgyas pa'i khyad par theg
NK072(nu)006:6137: pa rang gi lta spyod ting 'dzin gong 'og gi
NK072(nu)006:6138: lam rim bzhin // mthar thug grub pa'i mtha' 'bras sangs rgyas la yang khyad par yod pa ni /
NK072(nu)006:6139: lta ba 'og ma'i mthar phyin pas gong ma la sgrib pas khyad par phye ba yin //
NK072(nu)006:6140: khyad par des na dgyes pa chen pa'i longs spyod kyi khyad par gyis kyang //
NK072(nu)006:6141: mdo sde dang bya ba kri ya dang rnal 'byor yo ga gnyis kyi /
NK072(nu)006:6142: rgyud gzhung so so las ji ltar gsung pa bzhin dgyes par longs spyod pas /
NK072(nu)006:6143: gong gi ma h+aa'i dgyes chen po ni 'og gi yid tshod du gyur pa min no //
NK072(nu)006:6144: khyad par de phyir dgyes pa'i longs spyod la theg pa rim pa che chung yod pas //
NK072(nu)006:6145: theg pa rang sa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas la rim pa khyad par yod pa'i phyir //
NK072(nu)006:6146: sangs rgyas kyi sa'i ming grangs yon tan gyi cha shas tsam gyis khyad par phye ba min te //
NK072(nu)006:6147: ngo bo nyid kyis don la gong 'og gi 'bras
NK072(nu)006:6148: bu la khyad par yod pas ma h+aa rnam par
NK072(nu)006:6149: 'phags pa'o // theg pa 'og ma'i lam gyi rtsol bas ngal ba rnams //
NK072(nu)006:6150: brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir byang sems bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa dang /
NK072(nu)006:6151: kri ya rdor 'dzin dang yo ga stug po bkod par bstan pa yin la /
NK072(nu)006:6152: mthar thug ma h+aa'i 'bras bu pad+ma spyan dang yi
NK072(nu)006:6153: ge 'khor lo tshogs chen dang ye shes bla ma'i
NK072(nu)006:6154: sa gsum la yon tan gyi cha las brjod pa
NK072(nu)006:6156: de phyir theg pa gong 'og gi 'bras bu'i khyad
NK072(nu)006:6157: par skas gdong mtho dman yod pa lta bu ste
NK072(nu)006:6158: // rmad byung thabs mkhas ma h+aa'i theg pa 'di
NK072(nu)006:6159: yis ma h+aa las sa gzhan theg pa 'og ma
NK072(nu)006:6160: pa'i lam stegs kyi theg pa'i thabs la brten nas
NK072(nu)006:6161: gang mos su 'jug bcug cing de nas rim gyis
NK072(nu)006:6162: theg pa 'og ma nas gong mar 'du shes bsgyur
NK072(nu)006:6163: bas ma h+aa'i 'bras bu 'dir 'grub par bya ba'i
NK072(nu)006:6164: phyir theg pa 'og ma rnams rang rang gi thabs
NK072(nu)006:6165: // kyis // theg pa rang sa'i 'bras bu thob
NK072(nu)006:6166: pa tsam las theg pa rang rang gi 'bras bu
NK072(nu)006:6167: ngo bo nyid la khyad med cing /
NK072(nu)006:6168: gcig par smra ba ni blun por mun sprul gyi blo can yin pa'o //
NK072(nu)006:6169: lam mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o //
NK072(nu)006:6171: // 'gro ba lam log pa ni mu stegs chad pa
NK072(nu)006:6172: ci yang med par lta ba dang rtag pa dngos
NK072(nu)006:6174: byed pa po rtag par 'dod pa dang /
NK072(nu)006:6175: mur thug pa dang rgyang 'phen te 'di la rtag lta /
NK072(nu)006:6178: dbang phyug pa bye brag pa bzhi dang /
NK072(nu)006:6179: chad lta rgyang 'phen dang lnga zhes zer /
NK072(nu)006:6181: ni 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can lam rgyud
NK072(nu)006:6182: lnga dang de ltar lnga tshan gnyis kyi sems can
NK072(nu)006:6183: rnams bkri ba'i drang don phyir gsungs pa'o //
NK072(nu)006:6184: 'khor 'das tha dad mi gnyis pa gnyis su med
NK072(nu)006:6185: pa'i lam mchog 'bras bu lam du byed 'di bgyis
NK072(nu)006:6186: pa'i // ngal ba'i dge rtsas 'gro ba kun sangs rgyas kyi sar grol shog /
NK072(nu)006:6187: byang chub kyi don zhor la byed cing 'jig rten
NK072(nu)006:6188: gyi khe dang grags pa'i don du gnyer bar byed
NK072(nu)006:6189: pa dang / gsang sngags kyi man ngag gnyer mi
NK072(nu)006:6190: thub par man ngag yod pa skad kyis gzhan snod
NK072(nu)006:6191: med la bcud chen 'dzag cing man ngag zab mo
NK072(nu)006:6194: r+aa tsa stobs bzang gi btsun mo gtsug rgyal sgeg
NK072(nu)006:6195: mo zhes bya ba rgyal po stobs bzang gi btsun
NK072(nu)006:6196: mo gtsug rgyal sgeg mo zhes bya ba /
NK072(nu)006:6197: rgyal po stobs bzang gis rin po che'i sor gdub
NK072(nu)006:6198: chung ngu gcig brgyab pas mo'i mig chur song nas
NK072(nu)006:6199: mo a na zer zhing ngu'o //
NK072(nu)006:6200: gzhan gyis me tog 'thor bas kyang a na zer zhing ngu'o //
NK072(nu)006:6201: phyis g.yog po gcig dang phag tu 'dod pa spyod pa la /
NK072(nu)006:6202: theb gcig mo phyis pa la /
NK072(nu)006:6203: g.yog po tshig pa log ste dbyug pa brgyab pas
NK072(nu)006:6204: mi ngu bar he he zer zhing 'dug pas khrel
NK072(nu)006:6207: ni bram ze me chen sbur skyes zhes bya ba'i
NK072(nu)006:6208: drang srong gcig yod pas ma byin pa len pa
NK072(nu)006:6209: spangs pa yin zer zhing gzhan la me bslang tsam
NK072(nu)006:6210: na chos gos la rdul 'byar tsa na skyel du
NK072(nu)006:6211: 'ong ba la phag tu thob tshad rku ba gcig
NK072(nu)006:6212: yod pas mgar ba'i khyim na gser gyi sgrom bu
NK072(nu)006:6213: yod pa mthong nas mkhar sil gyi gsham na /
NK072(nu)006:6214: gar spyin brkus nas mgar ba'i spyin gyi gser gyi
NK072(nu)006:6215: sgrom bu la mkhar sil mis mi tshor bar btsugs
NK072(nu)006:6216: te sga sgur med par brkus so //
NK072(nu)006:6217: de yang rgyal bu mu tig skyug 'bebs zhes bya
NK072(nu)006:6218: ba gad mo bgad pa dang mu tig skyug pa
NK072(nu)006:6219: gcig yod pa la rgyal po stobs bzang gis mu
NK072(nu)006:6220: tig 'dod pa la rgyal bu bsdugs te rgyal bu
NK072(nu)006:6221: gzhan gyis mi mthong ba la rgyal pos gzhan mthong
NK072(nu)006:6222: sar bzhag nas ngo mtshar can gyi mthong snang la
NK072(nu)006:6223: gad mo yong du re nas bzhag go //
NK072(nu)006:6224: de la rgyal bus gong gi de tsho mthong ngo //
NK072(nu)006:6228: rgyal bus rgod bro ba 'dra ba ma mthong yid mug pa byung byas pas /
NK072(nu)006:6229: rgyal po na re da shod byas pa la rgyal bus tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
NK072(nu)006:6230: rgyal po me tog 'thor bshum dang //
NK072(nu)006:6231: ku m+aa ra'i a ma dang //
NK072(nu)006:6232: ne tso kha nas gshog thogs dang //
NK072(nu)006:6233: drang srong me len spur skyal dag /
NK072(nu)006:6234: mi dge bzhi la 'jol nyog spyod //
NK072(nu)006:6235: mu tig 'bebs pa ma gtogs pa //
NK072(nu)006:6236: bden par smra ba ngas ma mthong //
NK072(nu)006:6237: nga ni ha ha rgod re bro //
NK072(nu)006:6238: zhes bshad pas mu tig skyugs so //
NK072(nu)006:6239: ne bya ne tso kha na gshog tshang yin te /
NK072(nu)006:6240: ne tso gcig gis kha na gshog pa'i sgro bcug
NK072(nu)006:6241: ste chu 'thung zhing 'dug pa la des ci byed
NK072(nu)006:6242: byas pa la chu la srog chags 'dug pa shi
NK072(nu)006:6243: yi dogs pa yin zer ro //
NK072(nu)006:6244: mis mi mthong ba dang chu nang gi srog chags btung zhing za ba mthong ngo //
NK072(nu)006:6245: lta bu'i lkog g.yem sogs ku ma ri a ma yin te g.yo rgyus bzang sar 'dod cing /
NK072(nu)006:6246: mo khyo la ma dga' nas bu gcig skye nas yod pa la /
NK072(nu)006:6247: nga skyes pa pho dang reg pa spang ba yin
NK072(nu)006:6248: zer nas bu la nu ma blud tsam na gos
NK072(nu)006:6249: la bug pa phug nas blud /
NK072(nu)006:6250: phag tu skyes pa dang 'khrig pa spyad pa mthong ngo //
NK072(nu)006:6251: tshul bsrung zhing dam tshig la mi gnas dang //
NK072(nu)006:6252: gsang sngags bden ba'i gzhung la sran mi tshugs te brtson 'grus mi 'byung ba dang /
NK072(nu)006:6253: gzhung mang sgrub la yid ches dka' ba dang /
NK072(nu)006:6254: bla ma spyi bos gus par mi len mi khur cing //
NK072(nu)006:6255: zhe ba'i bla ma la skur pa 'debs zhing gzhan
NK072(nu)006:6256: mkhas pa dang chos yongs la'ang bskur pa 'debs pa
NK072(nu)006:6257: la sogs pa'i snod med rnams dang man ngag 'di
NK072(nu)006:6258: ma 'phrad cig / snod ldan rnams dang 'phrad par shog cig par smon lam btab bo //
NK072(nu)006:6259: rgyal ba'i bstan pa dam chos bdud rtsi yi //
NK072(nu)006:6260: nang nas theg mchog snying po'i bstan pa ste //
NK072(nu)006:6261: rmad byung gsang sngags sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i don //
NK072(nu)006:6262: stong phrag brgya ba'i rgyud las bcud bsdus pa //
NK072(nu)006:6263: sangs rgyas gsang ba'i man ngag lam gyi rim //
NK072(nu)006:6264: 'bru daka'i don bkrol gsal byed me long 'di //
NK072(nu)006:6265: bskul ba'i don phyir sems bskyed yi ger bkod //
NK072(nu)006:6266: dge bas 'gro kun yang dag lam rnyed shog /
NK072(nu)006:6267: lam gyi rim pa'i 'bru dka' ba rnam gsal bar
NK072(nu)006:6268: byed pa'i me long zhes bya ba sh+aakya'i dge slong
NK072(nu)006:6270: mang yul khri babs su gnyag dz+ny+aa na ku ma ras bsgyur ba lam rnam par bkod pa /
NK072(nu)006:6271: sangs rgyas gsang ba'i man ngag rdzogs so ////
